value.stringValue: The service {!$Record.Name} launched and MLS not completed

assignments.name: Assign_Opportunities_with_missing_IDX_Services
assignments.label: Assign Opportunities with missing IDX Services

formulas.name: forFinalQADate
formulas.expression: CASE({!$Record.RecordType.Name}, "Website Launches", {!for2BDays}, "Property Website", {!for1BDay}, "Design Refresh",{!for1BDay}, "Template Change",{!for1BDay}, "Platform Migration", {!for2BDays}, {!for1BDay})

formulas.name: forNewClientTaskName
formulas.expression: IF( {!$Record.Account__r.VIP__c} = true, " VIP New Client Set Up", "New Client Set Up" )

formulas.name: forServiceName
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Opportunity__r.VIP__c}=true, "VIP " + {!$Record.Account__r.Name} + " - IDX Tool", IF({!$Record.Opportunity__r.Semi_Custom_Pod__c}=true, "SCP " + {!$Record.Account__r.Name} + " - IDX Tool", {!$Record.Account__r.Name} + " - IDX Tool"))

loops.label: Add Opportunities with missing IDX Service

textTemplates.name: bodyIDXAlert
bodyOnHoldEmail
textTemplates.text: The Service stage is on hold for {!$Record.Name} : https://luxurypresence.lightning.force.com/{!$Record.Id}

textTemplates.name: bodyReadyToLaunchEmail
textTemplates.text: Website is being prepared to launch for {!$Record.Name} : https://luxurypresence.lightning.force.com/{!$Record.Id}

textTemplates.name: bodyRevisionEmail
textTemplates.text: Stage has been moved and team is working on it/ reviewing for {!$Record.Name}: https://luxurypresence.lightning.force.com/{!$Record.Id}

textTemplates.description: Body template for the social media email notification
textTemplates.name: bodySocialMedia
bodyWDReview
textTemplates.text:
Hi, {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName}!


The Website Draft from your Client, {!$Record.Name}, is now ready for review! Please check the Service in Salesforce.

textTemplates.name: bodyWebsiteDraftEmail
textTemplates.text: Hi Team, the build for service {!$Record.Name} has started: https://luxurypresence.lightning.force.com/{!$Record.Id}
